##### FILE: hostports140.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

kind: Pod

  name: hostports1
  namespace: default

  containers:

    name: container1

      hostPort: 12346

kind: Pod

  containers:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports146.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: hostports147.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

kind: Pod

        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostports1 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

kind: Pod

##### FILE: hostports1904.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

kind: Pod

##### FILE: hostports2157.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports2

  containers:

      hostPort: 12345
    - containerPort: 12347

      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

      hostPort: 12346
    - containerPort: 12348

    seccompProfile:
